snippet: The inmate, Jack H. Smith, had been on death row since October 1978 for a fatal shooting during a $90 robbery of a Houston store.
abstract: Texas prison officials announce death of oldest condemned prisoner, 78-year-old Jack H Smith, from natural causes.
lead_paragraph: The inmate, Jack H. Smith, had been on death row since October 1978 for a fatal shooting during a $90 robbery of a Houston store.

headline.main: Oldest Condemned Man in Texas Dies of Natural Causes
headline.print_headline: Oldest Man Condemned  for Killing  in Texas Dies
